type.description:
## Air

---


[Block Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/air).

Checks whether the block is a type of air (`minecraft:air`, `minecraft:cave_air`, etc). 

Type ID: `apugli:air`

---

### Example
```json
{
    "type": "apugli:air"
}
```

title: Air (Block Condition Type) date: 2021-08-11

Air

Block Condition Type.

Checks whether the block is a type of air (minecraft:air, minecraft:cave_air, etc).

None.
